title: League crashes my laptop
body:
Whenever I'm in the lobby, queue or champ select, my laptop restarts
I don't know why. Can anyone help me out?
I use a Macbook Pro 15inch and League is the only application I've installed. Please help

replies.body: If your laptop is randomly shutting down like that, it might be more closely related to your pc hardware rather than something League is doing. There's a chance that it's overheating due not being able to run League efficiently, or possibly from fans not working properly. Go ahead and hit up our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they may be able to walk you through some steps to help find out just what is causing those restarts.
